TextLibrary.Text: It is over. Liandra was my betrothed before the Undead took her.
It is over. Liandra was my betrothed before the Undead took her.
It is over. Liandra was my betrothed before the Undead took her.
It is over. Liandra was my betrothed before the Undead took her.
I'm sorry, Syrus. At least she's at peace now.
I'm sorry, Syrus. At least she's at peace now.
I'm sorry, Syrus. At least she's at peace now.
I'm sorry, Syrus. At least she's at peace now.
That may be, and I envy her. For peace is something I will never know...
